definition: to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: What punishment will people receive if they refuse to apply for a temporary residence permit?
sentences.chinese: 例句拒不辦暫住證將受到哪些處罰？

sentences.english: After the weakening of the power to enforce temporary residence permits, how big a floating population does Beijing actually have?
sentences.chinese: 暫住證強制力削弱後，北京究竟擁有多少流動人口？

sentences.english: She said she had scrambled to apply for the coveted document but too late.
sentences.chinese: 李平說她去申請暫住證的時候已經太晚了。

sentences.english: Show me your passport or temporary residence certificate, please.
sentences.chinese: 請您把護照或暫住證給我看一下。

sentences.english: For second-hand housing transfer procedures, to provide temporary residence permits to buy it?
sentences.chinese: 辦理二手房過戶手續，需要購買人提供暫住證嗎？

sentences.english: She has managed to obtain a temporary residence permit.
What punishment will people refusing to apply for a temporary residence permit receive?
sentences.chinese: 拒不辦暫住證將受到哪些處罰？

definition: receipt (written acknowledgement of receipt of an item)
to affix a seal/to stamp (a document)/to sign off on sth
lit. to play the yu 竽 mouth organ to make up numbers (idiom); fig. to make up the numbers with inferior products/to masquerade as having an ability/token member of a group
to report the loss of something
